docs.description: A well-defined Git naming convention enhances collaboration, supports automated versioning, and simplifies project maintenance. default.title: EzHr-Chatbot
default.description: This is the LLM-based assistant for the EzHr-Chatbot project. It makes use of RAG and LlamaIndex to provide a conversational interface for the users.
